result.title: Secure your passwords!
result.content:
Hi everyone!

A new cheating way is gaining much success.

The cheater hacks some victim, through trying to use the username as the password. I.e. the cheater tries to login with handle X, and password X. At the first glance, you'll think that's too naive. However, it turns out to be working better than expected.

I don't really know why there are people who are keen on cheating. All what they can do is to brag about it with some naive people, but that seems to be enough reason for them. I hope they be more rational and realize that they really harm themselves, and will be regretful when they are exposed.

The hero (cheater) of this story, is Solve_Every_Where He searches for newly registered people, and try to login to their accounts, and copy their codes during live contests.

Incidents:-

26278353, 26281970, 26282753

25901178, 25920747

24962408, 24968332

24965258, 24977844

24755923, 24762120

24501502, 24504531

And there are others too. He's been privately warned and advised, but he just denies cheating and doesn't stop it.

We checked these accounts, and they turned out to be using the same password as their handle.

Hence, just a call for all those people who use just weak passwords, you really have to change them.
